name: HSP_BKT_EOB_INFO
description: This table contains claims-related explanation of benefits (EOB) information for liability buckets.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bucket record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EOB_PAYOR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the payer record for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_PMT_HTR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the payment transaction record for the claim explanation of benefits (EOB) information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_ORIG_BKT_ID
columns.description: The original liability bucket record for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_CVG_ID
columns.description: The coverage record for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_INV_NUM
columns.description: The invoice number for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_DEPOSIT_DATE
columns.description: The deposit date for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_PMT_AMT
columns.description: The payment amount for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_ICN
columns.description: This column stores the internal control number information for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_ALLOW_AMT
columns.description: The allowed amount for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_NOT_ALLOW_AMT
columns.description: The not allowed amount for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_DEDUCT_AMT
columns.description: The deductible amount for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_COINS_AMT
columns.description: The coinsurance amount for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_COPAY_AMT
columns.description: The copay amount for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_COB_AMT
columns.description: This column stores the coordination of benefits amount for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_ADJ_AMT
columns.description: The adjustment amount for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_NON_COVERED_AMT
columns.description: The non covered amount for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_IMD_ID
columns.description: This column stores the remittance image record (IMD) for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: EOB_POST_DATE
columns.description: The post date for the claim EOB information associated with this liability bucket.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: Hospital account record associated with this liability bucket.
